wpt.name: GC1DE8W
wpt.desc: Maryland House II by Son_of_Mt_Soma, Traditional Cache (2.5/2.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Maryland House II
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: A small size cache located at the Maryland House Rest Stop on I-95, just north of Exit 80 (Belcamp, MD)
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The other Maryland House cache (GC19M0Z) has been doing alot of business since it was placed in February 2008--112 logged finds in 4 months time. So, of course to help handle the extra business, a second cache is needed.
The second cache is located at the north end of the rest area. The woods here are a little thicker than what is found around Maryland House I. The parking area near the cache is accessible to both north and south bound traffic.
Please do not park on I-95 to get to this cache. There is plenty of parking at the rest area, and it is only a short walk. There is a path that gets you some of the way to the cache. Bushwhacking will be required for the rest of the journey.
During the summer months, briers and ticks will be a problem.
The cache is smaller than Maryland House I. It can handle small TBs and geocoins. This cache should be a little more of a challenge than Maryland House I.
MN Chillin' TB27MKK is in the cache for the FTF.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: Chapter 33, Verse 22 of the Book of Exodus

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Got here after dark a few days after heavy rains (mushy!) but I got it.
